SUPER (erightsoft, free) converts mkv to normal divx or xvid with mp3 very well I did it with the Luftslottet mkv. I will upload english subs with divx subtitles

til henrik som har suddig film:
det gäller att ha retta x264-codec inne. Viss vlc gör susen, hämta sista ffdshow-filter till din mediaplayer. Eller besöka x264.nl

Det er på hög tid att man börjar bruka x264/aac, det ger bra kvalite och snabba downloads.

kuifje:

What could possibly be worth it converting a mkv x264/aac to xvid/mp3 other than playing it on a standalone divx-player. You loose quality as well, and might be better off just hooking up your laptop with s-video to the tv.
The DVD is available, get that one instead and recode it instead of putting out crappy transcoded releases.

egilso:
I have a divx standalone player. I cannot see or hear difference in quality, that is for hifi junks.
Anybody who prefers standard avi files can use a conversion program that is up to them. I only uploaded english subs, not present  in your mkv
